description.value: You provide emotional and spiritual care. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned} to the list of conditions you can reduce with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Treat Condition]{Treat Condition}. If the stunned condition has a duration instead of a value, you can't use Treat Condition to reduce it.
